card.name: Always Watching
card.property: Nontoken creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We pray to Avacyn on high. On snow-white wings fearless you fly. Keep safe our souls. Keep safe our lives. May angels watch us from the skies." —Children's prayer

card.name: Angel of Deliverance
card.property: Flying Delirium — Whenever Angel of Deliverance deals damage, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, exile target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Angelic Purge
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent. Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment.

card.name: Apothecary Geist
card.property: Flying When Apothecary Geist enters the battlefield, if you control another Spirit, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For some customers, the old apothecary shop still opens its doors.

card.name: Archangel Avacyn
card.property: Flash Flying, vigilance When Archangel Avacyn enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. When a non-Angel creature you control dies, transform Archangel Avacyn at the beginning of the next upkeep.

alternate.name: Avacyn, the Purifier
alternate.property: Flying When this creature transforms into Avacyn, the Purifier, it deals 3 damage to each other creature and each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wings that once bore hope are now stained with blood. She is our guardian no longer."—Grete, cathar apostate

card.name: Avacynian Missionaries
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if Avacynian Missionaries is equipped, transform it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We come bearing the word of Avacyn and the Lunarch Council."

alternate.name: Lunarch Inquisitors
alternate.property: When this creature transforms into Lunarch Inquisitors, you may exile another target creature until Lunarch Inquisitors leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We come bearing the tools of confession and absolution."

card.name: Bound by Moonsilver
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack, block, or transform. Sacrifice another permanent: Attach Bound by Moonsilver to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and only once each turn.

card.name: Bygone Bishop
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a creature spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Cathar's Companion
card.property: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cathar's Companion gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unwavering and loyal, they represent stability in uncertain times." —Rem Karolus, Slayer of Angels

card.name: Chaplain's Blessing
card.property: You gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There was a time when the purpose of the church was to heal and protect. I would see that time return."

card.name: Dauntless Cathar
card.property: {1} {W}, Exile Dauntless Cathar from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The harder they try to extinguish my faith, the brighter it burns in the darkness."

card.name: Declaration in Stone
card.property: Exile target creature and all other creatures its controller controls with the same name as that creature. That player investigates for each nontoken creature exiled this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The message was clear to Sorin—Nahiri had paid Markov Manor a visit.

card.name: Descend upon the Sinful
card.property: Exile all creatures. Delirium — Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Above the cries, a phrase rang out: "You will all be saved."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On expeditions through Ashmouth, the hunters of Devilthorn Lodge rely on the cleverness of foxes to counteract the mischief of devils.

card.name: Drogskol Cavalry
card.property: Flying Whenever another Spirit enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life. {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Eerie Interlude
card.property: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The barrier between existence and oblivion is thinner than you know.

card.name: Emissary of the Sleepless
card.property: Flying When Emissary of the Sleepless enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Ethereal Guidance
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The call of the Blessed Sleep is not so strong as the call to protect those in need." —Saint Traft

card.name: Expose Evil
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the pure stand tall in the light." —Sigarda

card.name: Gryff's Boon

card.name: Hanweir Militia Captain
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more creatures, transform Hanweir Militia Captain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her reputation inspires both loyalty and adoration.

alternate.name: Westvale Cult Leader
alternate.property: Westvale Cult Leader's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white and black Human Cleric creature token.

card.name: Hope Against Hope
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control. As long as enchanted creature is a Human, it has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have given my life to the church, my soul to Avacyn, and my heart to the people."

card.name: Humble the Brute
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The element of surprise only works when it's backed up by a bolt between the eyes."

card.name: Inquisitor's Ox
card.property: Delirium — Inquisitor's Ox gets +1/+0 and has vigilance as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many fields now lie fallow in Gavony, as the oxen have been confiscated to perform other duties.

card.name: Inspiring Captain
card.property: When Inspiring Captain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our enemies will soon discover that we are not as meek as they had believed."

card.name: Militant Inquisitor
card.property: Militant Inquisitor gets +1/+0 for each Equipment you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am an instrument of the church wielded against Avacyn's enemies."

card.name: Moorland Drifter
card.property: Delirium — Moorland Drifter has flying as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has no apparent purpose or direction. It simply drifts, buoyed by breezes both tangible and otherworldly.

card.name: Nahiri's Machinations
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. {1}{R}: Nahiri's Machinations deals 1 damage to target blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sorin, I'm going to take everything from you."

card.name: Nearheath Chaplain
card.property: Lifelink {2}{W}, Exile Nearheath Chaplain from your graveyard: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Not Forgotten
card.property: Put target card from a graveyard on the top or bottom of its owner's library. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Visit the dead, and they may return the favor.

card.name: Odric, Lunarch Marshal
card.property: At the beginning of each combat, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Open the Armory
card.property: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once Avacyn returned, I hoped I'd never need these things again. I didn't think I'd be dusting them off to use against angels."

card.name: Paranoid Parish-Blade
card.property: Delirium — Paranoid Parish-Blade gets +1/+0 and has first strike as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mind is perfectly capable of creating its own monsters.

card.name: Pious Evangel
card.property: Whenever Pious Evangel or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice another permanent: Transform Pious Evangel.

alternate.name: Wayward Disciple
alternate.property: Whenever Wayward Disciple or another creature you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . and I will prove my devotion."

card.name: Puncturing Light
card.property: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you refuse to see the light, then you will feel it."

card.name: Reaper of Flight Moonsilver
card.property: Flying Delirium — Sacrifice another creature: Reaper of Flight Moonsilver gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Silverstrike
card.property: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shield yourself with faith. Arm yourself with silver." —Slayer Kastinne

card.name: Spectral Shepherd
card.property: Flying {1}{U}: Return target Spirit you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The restless geists of common folk often continue their lifelong labors.

card.name: Stern Constable
card.property: {T}, Discard a card: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm sure you have a story. Everyone has a story. You can tell it to the bars."

card.name: Strength of Arms
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control an Equipment, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We fight not for Avacyn, but for her ideals; not for the church, but for its people." —Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The longest nights are measured not in hours, but in heartbeats.

card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn. Untap those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thalia established the Order of Saint Traft in an effort to bring together cathars who would stand against the corruption of the Lunarch Council.

card.property: When Thalia's Lieutenant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Human you control. Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Thalia's Lieutenant.

card.property: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."

card.property: Flying When Topplegeist enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, tap target creature that player controls.

card.property: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Transform Town Gossipmonger.

alternate.name: Incited Rabble

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rumors are sparks: gather enough of them and something's going to catch fire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who aren't welcome will know it!" —Kolman, elder of Gatstaf

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Geists seeking redemption must first be given the opportunity.

alternate.name: Perfected Form
alternate.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The final pages of the experiment log were blank. Investigators found it abandoned on a desk in the researcher's lab, open, the pages flipping in the wind from a shattered window.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some minds bend under pressure. Others break.

card.name: Catalog

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The appearance of these warped stones throughout the provinces is too pervasive to be random. More evidence is needed to determine the reason behind them." —Tamiyo's journal
